cb:div.head: 編委會名單
cb:div.p:

周紹良 吳立民
主 編：方廣錩
副主編：姚長壽
蘇 軍 華方田

姚長壽 華方田 黃維中
黎 明 蘇 軍

cb:div.p:
Publication programme, 1998: Volume 5 ISBN 7-80123-153-8/
K. 50, CIP 98 25233.

Subscription prices, per volume: USD 20.00, including postage sea
mail.

Prices for single volumes: USD 20.00 plus USD 2.00 postage sea
mail or USD 6.00 air mail.

Subscriptions should be sent to FANG Guangchang, Institute for Research
on world Religions, Chinese Academy
of Social Sciences, 5 Jian Guo Men Nei Street, Beijing
100732, or to any of our editors abroad.

Changes of mailing address should be notified together with our latest
label.
